## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3f471eb7d9f521078e7b782c8aeb9e063e3aab0cb0b29c312a3e9122da51bc10)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'action-mattermost-notify' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
